formatDescription: This is the native file format for word processor Text602, which was released in 1988 by Czechoslovakian company 602 Svazarm (since the 1990s known as IT company Software602).
provenanceCompoundName: The National Archives of the Czech Republic / The National Archives of the Czech Republic

internalSignatures.name: 602 Text file
internalSignatures.note: BOF Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: @CT followed by a space
